humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is 2.1 x 1.7 x 1.5 cm. Based on the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 2.1 x 1.7 x 1.5 cm, which falls within the T2 category (T2: Tumor size 2.1-5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
